                     throws java.lang.Exception
Sets the observations to compute the PDFs from. Cannot be called in conjunction with start/add/finaliseAddObservations. valid is a time series (with time indices the same as observations) indicating whether the observation at that point is valid. sourceValid is the same for the source

computeStartAndEndTimePairs

public java.util.Vector<int[]> computeStartAndEndTimePairs(boolean[] valid)
Compute a vector of start and end pairs of time points, between which we have valid series of the observations. Made public so it can be used if one wants to compute the number of observations prior to setting the observations.

makeJointVectorForPast

protected double[][] makeJointVectorForPast(double[] destination)
Generate a vector for each time step, containing the past k states of the destination. Does not include a vector for the first k time steps.
